mapper.select: SELECT t1.rental_home_no, t1.member_no as reporter_no, t1.report_category_no, t1.state, t1.created_date, t2.rental_home_report_name as category_name FROM rental_home_report t1 INNER JOIN rental_home_report_category t2 on t1.report_category_no = t2.rental_home_report_no ORDER BY t1.created_date desc

SELECT rhr.rental_home_no, rhr.member_no as reporter_no, m.name as reporter_name, rhr.report_category_no, rhrc.rental_home_report_name as category_name, rhr.created_date, rhr.content, rhr.state, rh.member_no as writer_no, m2.name as writer_name, rh.name, rh.address, rh.state as rental_state, rh.registe_date FROM rental_home_report rhr INNER JOIN rental_home_report_category rhrc ON rhr.report_category_no = rhrc.rental_home_report_no INNER JOIN rental_home rh ON rhr.rental_home_no = rh.rental_home_no INNER JOIN member m ON rhr.member_no = m.member_no INNER JOIN member m2 ON rh.member_no = m2.member_no WHERE rhr.rental_home_no = #{rentalNo} AND rhr.member_no = #{memberNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE rental_home_report set state = '1' WHERE rental_home_no = #{rentalNo} AND member_no = #{memberNo};
